public.ai_agents.name: ai_agents
public.ai_agents.definition: SELECT id, name, description, system_prompt, tone, guidance, model, max_tokens, temperature, is_active, is_default, created_at, updated_at, created_by, deleted_at FROM core.ai_agents

public.roles.name: roles
public.roles.definition: SELECT id, name, description, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM core.roles

public.departments.name: departments
public.departments.definition: SELECT id, name, description, created_at, updated_at, created_by, deleted_at FROM core.departments

public.tasks.name: tasks
public.tasks.definition: SELECT id, title, description, priority, status, department_id, vertical_key, due_date, created_by, updated_by, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, estimated_duration, important_links, is_starred, "position" FROM common_util.tasks

public.task_assignees.name: task_assignees
public.task_assignees.definition: SELECT id, task_id, profile_id, role, created_at FROM common_util.task_assignees

public.leads.name: leads
public.leads.definition: SELECT id, contact_id, company_id, owner_id, status, source, value, probability, expected_close_date, notes, tags, meta, vertical_id, created_at, updated_at, created_by, deleted_at FROM crm.leads

public.profiles.name: profiles
public.profiles.definition: SELECT id, user_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone, department_id, avatar_url, created_at, updated_at, created_by, deleted_at FROM core.profiles

public.notification_preferences.name: notification_preferences
public.notification_preferences.definition: SELECT id, user_id, notification_type, enabled, email_enabled, whatsapp_enabled, created_at, updated_at FROM core.notification_preferences
